INVALIDACCOUNT: No. Client only accepts numbers and 9 digits.
INVALIDPASSWORD: The password must have at least 6 to 12 characters, at least one digit, at least one lower case, and at least one upper case.
INVALIDPHONE: Phone only accepts numbers and 10 digits.
ACCESSAPP: Still do not have access to our App?
NAME: Name
SELFIEERROR: Invalid photo: Only your face should appear.
LOGINERROR: Your password or username are incorrect.
NOTFACE: It is not a face or there is more than one.
INFOREGISTER:
To complete the registration, check your text messages, an authentication code must have arrived that you must provide below.
If the code has not arrived, select the Resend option.
NCER: The client number is already registered.
CNCD: The CURP does not match the data.
ONLYLETTERS: Only letters and spaces are accepted
